org.zeromq.ZMQDevice

type
class
available in
cpp
Wraps ZMQ zmq_device method call. Creates in-built ZMQ devices that run in the current thread of execution

Constructor

new(type : DeviceType, frontend : ZMQSocket, backend : ZMQSocket)
parameters
type A valid DeviceType
frontend Front end socket, bound or connected to by clients
backend Back end socket, bound or connected to workers
Constructor. Creates a new ZMQ device and immediately starts its in-built loop. Will continue unless process is interrupted, when it returns a ETERM ZMQ_Exception.
